title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout Build 2002071610021.
OB: When running the attached test case and performing specific actions in the Coolbar, deleting items on the second row results in the entire second row being removed.
EB: The second row should remain intact after deleting an item on the second row.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Run the attached test case.
2. Drag the Open Type coolitem to the second row (last coolItem).
3. Drag the Launch coolitem (last coolItem on first row) to the second row, putting it after the Open Type item.
4. Drag the Search coolitem to the second row, putting it after the Launch coolitem.
5. Drag the Script coolitem to the second row (last coolItem on the first row), putting it after the Search coolitem.
6. Press the Delete button.

Note the removal of the first item on the second row and the unintended removal of the entire second row.
